quote: Love life, Live Love
author: Benny Bellamacina

quote: Love with passion. Love for no reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love is holy.
author: William Shakespeare,  All's Well That Ends Well

quote: Love! Love until the night collapses!
author: Pablo Neruda,  Machu Picchu

quote: Love, and you shall be loved.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is enough.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love simply is.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Witch Of Portobello

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Give away love to be loved.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce,  The Unabridged Devil's Dictionary

quote: Love with all your heart. And the rest of your body. Oh, and your mind, too.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Love: It will kill you and save you, both
author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium

quote: Love as if you were created by the universe just to love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love without judging. Love without reason.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Love is the magic, mystery, and the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is about mutual respect, apart from attraction.
author: George Best

quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses!
author: Honoré de Balzac

quote: Love means never having to be apart
author: James Patterson,  Sundays at Tiffany's

quote: Love is a flower of mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: Love is the energy of life.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Love is my inner strength and my power.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: Love gives you eyes.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock

quote: Love is honesty. Love is a mutual respect for one another.
author: Simone Elkeles,  Leaving Paradise

quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Love is ______ (fill in the blank yourself).
author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: to love means to realize there is a time to let the beloved one go
author: Tony Parsons,  Man and Boy

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Choose to be in love!
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplaceable being.
author: Tom Robbins,  Jitterbug Perfume

quote: Love is so unconditional; love liberates; love is the reason why I do what I do, and so I think it is the greatest gift we have.
author: BeBe Winans

quote: Love is the essence, fragrance, and beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Love is a combination of care, commitment, knowledge, responsibility, respect and trust.
author: bell hooks,  Communion: The Female Search for Love

quote: Love is how you stay alive, even after you are gone.
author: Mitch Albom

quote: Love is a flower that grows in the garden of mind if we treat it with kindness, compassion, and joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I can’t define what love is. That’s like eating a pancake with a waffle instead of a fork. But you know it when you feel it, like petting a cat wearing a synthetic fur coat.
author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: To love is to suffer and there can be no love otherwise.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  Notes from Underground

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: Love is the science of reducing your sound while upping the amplitude of another person.
author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
